name: Hidden Hearts
description:
Made for Brackeys' Game Jam #2

Hidden Hearts - a game where you try to find hearts to deliver to the princess!

MADE BY: Team Colorful

INSTRUCTIONS:
Find hearts until a portal opens.
YOU CAN ONLY FIND ONE HEART BEFORE YOU CAN FIND ANOTHER.

Once you have collected all hearts on the map, a portal will open.

Click on that portal to go to the next level.

At the end, get the heart and give it to a princess by clicking on her.
